title: Fatal Whispers
description: A millionaire’s beautiful young wife. A homeless woman. A parish priest.Three baffling deaths within days. No sign of foul play. No police leads. Even medical authorities can’t explain the cause of death—an unprecedented occurrence in Portland, Maine.Megan Scott and Michael Elliott look for answers when their trip to this alluring New England town coincides with the mysterious deaths. As they probe deeper, they discover ominous secrets buried decades ago and ruthless killers who won’t let anyone get in the way of revenge.
author: Sandra Nikolai
